body.name: Dash Cam Hardwire Kit,Micro USB Plug Hard Wire Kit Fuse for Dashcam, Bangjia 12V-24V to 5V/2A Car Dash Camera Charger Power Cord（11.5 ft
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 1 hr 3 mins
features: ✅【Upgraded the 3nd Generation Dash Cam Hardwire Kit】 -The newly upgraded Dash Cam Hardwire Kit Micro USB in 2021 has dual power-off protection functions. When your car's voltage is lower than 11.7V, the Hardwire Kit will automatically cut off the power for the first time. 11.6V will automatically cut off the power supply for the second time, thus effectively preventing the loss of the car battery voltage

✅【High Secure Standards】 -The micro USB hardwire kit with built-in High Precision switching power supply module can transform 12V(24V) to 5V. The built-in safeguards protect your devices against excessive current, overheating;Input:12v - 24v, Output: 5v 2A;Input length:1.5ft, Output length:10ft.Overall 11.5ft hardwire kit can be installed basically on All vehicles

✅【Extensive compatibility】 -This hard-wired kit is suitable for most models. The hard-wired kit has the function of automatically identifying the voltage. When you start the car, the hard-wired kit will automatically determine the voltage of the car (the voltage is between 12-24V). Suitable for driving recorders, rearview mirrors, GPS navigators, radar detectors, etc

✅【24 Hours Surveillance】 -The vehicle hard-wire kit connected to car battery or fuse box power, can uninterruptedly supply power for dash camera for 24 hours. It can even supply power when the car is turned off.If the voltage of your car battery drops to 11.7V or 23.5V, the regulator will cut off the power,which leaves you with enough power to start your car
✅【Easy Installation】 -Simple hidden wiring keeps the car neat and tidy and releases the cigarette lighter for connecting to more devices. TIPS: Please read the quick guide carefully before use

✅【Note】-If you do not use the car for a long time, please turn off unnecessary power-consuming devices in the car. The Hardwire Kit can only control the Dash Cam and cannot control other devices, so as not to dry the car battery, causing your car's voltage to be too low and you can't start the car
body.description: Safety Notes Pertorm the installation with the ignition in the OFF position. Do not strip any live wires. Correct electnical polarity and grounding is required for safe and proper installation. Only connect to a negative ground DC supply circuit. Not for installation to positive ground circuits. If you don't have experience on installing the hardwire kits for the dash cam, please ask professional for help.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Upgraded the 3nd Generation Dash Cam Hardwire Kit This Dash Cam Hardwire Kit. Perfect for 24/7 Parking Surveillance.Low voltage protection protects against battery dying.Bangjia Dash cam hardwire kit works for almost all car mini or micro USB device, such as dash cam、mirror cam、GPS navigator and radar detector etc. Installation in minutes with little to no expertise required.11.5ft/3.5meter power cable included.

Technical Details Connector: Mini USB Connector Input Voltage: DC 12V-24V Output Voltage: 5V Output Current: 2A Working Temperature:-40~ 160 Degree F Cable Length: 11.5ft/3.5m Low Voltage Protection: 11.6V for 12V vehicle; 23.5V for 24V vehicle. Safety Notes Pertorm the installation with the ignition in the OFF position. Do not strip any live wires. Correct electnical polarity and grounding is required for safe and proper installation. Only connect to a negative ground DC supply circuit. Not for installation to positive ground circuits. If you don't have experience on installing the hardwire kits for the dash cam, please ask professional for help.

The main function Low Voltage Protection Set 6 high-precision resistors,Dual power-off protection chip, intelligent low-voltage protection device can read the battery voltage more accurately, When your car's voltage is lower than 11.7V or 11.6V, it will automatically turn off the power. Protect your car battery more effectively. 24 Hours Parking Surveillance The vehicle hard-wire kit connected to car battery or fuse box power, can uninterruptedly supply power for dash camera for 24 hours. It can even supply power when the car is turned off. Fuse Puller One free fuse puller inside the storage box for easy picking.

Scope of application Four Types of Fuses Adapters for Almost All Cars Comes with Low-profile mini fuse, Mini fuse, Micro 2 fuse, ATO (regular) fuse adapters for you to use whatever your vehicles fuse box requires. Besides, with the seal wire connectors that will be easy for you to connect, firm connection and prevent short circuit. Upgraded the 3nd Generation Dash Cam Hardwire Kit An automatic matching device is set at the mini connector to make the compatibility range wider, such as Apeman Aukey Rexing Vantrue Vava Garmin Dash cam, etc. Compatible 12 – 24V Vehicles This hardwire kit accepts voltage from any type of vehicles runs on 12 – 24V, works perfect for car, truck, bus, suvs, or big rig for continuous power.

Installation steps Find the Correct Fuse Slot Open the fuse box, find the correct fuse slot for your hardwire kit. If you need to find an ignition switched fuse, put the key in the vehicle, find the fuse which is not lit up while the car is off, and test it by turning the car on to see if it lights up. If your kit requires constant power, turn off the car and remove the key to see which fuse slots stays lit on. Connect the Red Wire Once you've determined which fuse slots you need to use for your hardwiring kit you can crimp the red wire of your hardwire kit onto the Add-A-Fuse. Gently remove the fuse you identified. Install the fuse you just removed into the installation kit add-a-fuse circuit. Plug the add-a-circuit into the fuse box in the correct orientation. Ground the Hardwiring Kit Slip the black wire (which is in the shape of a C) under a metal bolt or screw in your vehicle (this is the ground wire). Check that it is not attached onto plastic parts. You will typically need a socket wrench to loosen the nut or bolt that you choose to ground with. To attach the grounding terminal, loosen the nut or bolt enough to slip it in and tighten it back up afterwards.

Dash Cam Hardwire Kit Mini USB Dash Cam Hardwire Kit Micro USB Dash Cam Hardwire Kit Type C USB Plug Mini USB Micro USB Type C USB Output Current 2A 2A 2A Input Voltage DC 12V-24V DC 12V-24V DC 12V-24V Output Voltage: 5V 5V 5V 5V

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install. Comes with everything needed
reviews.reviewText: Came with everything needed for install and then some. Super sturdy. I was very pleased to receive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Didnt realize this was micro, because the camera i had was a mini connector but i was able to find an adapter so no complaints there

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Did not work out for me,probably because of type of dash cam I have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Don’t buy didn’t last but a month actually it lasted 4 days over a month so no return

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t put out 5v, so it was useless
reviews.reviewText: Went through all the effort to wire this in and run the cables through my truck to find out when I turned it on, the dash cam didn’t work. Checked the output voltage and it was 3v, it is supposed to be 5v, so had to pull it all out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DOA, and can't request replacement.
reviews.reviewText: Perfect solution in theory. Mine was DOA, unfortunately. 12V on the fuse box end was good, per the multimeter, but it wouldn't power the camera. I did check the camera, it works fine with a good power source. Came with four power taps, and three fuses. Of course the type fuse I need for this car was the one missing. And it appeared that the seal has been broken. Have a feeling this particular example has been returned before. I attempted to request a replacement, but Amazon wouldn't allow it. Obviously, not recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well worth the money
